ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I know for a fact that religion is used to determine faction as well.  I m not positive about class, but I would suspect it to be true.  The fact that religion
ygData.messageBody:
I know for a fact that religion is used to determine faction as well. I'm not
positive about class, but I would suspect it to be true. The fact that
religion is used to determine some faction adjustments prompted me to declare
myself Agnostic when I created my bard. This choice may not have eliminated
all of my problems though, because as I said earlier in a Guk thread, they
attacked me on sight even though I'd never killed any of their kind.

Crier Sharpsong - 25 bard on Fennin Ro

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 11:10 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> wondering what quests you are hoping the guise will allow you to do. you
> may be able to use a guise/carillion combo in some cases, but the npcs also
> look at class in many cases and it won't help you. i.e. i went into neriak
> for the first time and the guards still scowl at me with the dark elf
> illusion. just curious though, i have not extensively tested this.
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
> Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > There are several quests I'd like to explore and this is the
> > only way I'll
> > get the chance short of retiring my bard for about 6 months
> > to build up an
> > evil character.
> >
> > thank you for your time in this blatant request for aid and
> > assistance.
>
> >
